name: Moments–private shared albums
description:
See what your AR Studio effects look like on your mobile device.

AR Studio Player works with the Mac app, AR Studio, which lets you create advanced effects with augmented reality for the Facebook camera.

Use AR Studio Player to:

- Mirror effects, like masks and frames, from your computer to your mobile device
- Test how your creations respond to movement and interaction
- Store multiple effects and versions in the app
